title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes.
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: They found him at Fetteresso, discomposed with the ague,—a baddisorder to bring to a field of battle.

title: Miscellaneous Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott, Bart
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: 1 " He went from Fetteresso lo Brechin.
